A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A refreshing and original episode compared to the force awakens\, much like empire strikes back was at the time compared to a new hope. I really enjoyed it\, except the Rose+Finn subplot at canto bight which could have been dropped to reduce the runtime to 2h and focus more on Luke+Rey +Kylo which was the best part of the script and delivered the most interesting performance and dialogues. The action scenes are top notch and some of the best directed ones of the entire saga with its large steady shots (no hysterical cuts) especially during the fight with the preatorian guards. A great movie\, a great Star Wars episode that finally delivers novelty and risks for the new trilogy.
